name: Cultivation Path Prototype
description:
I'm 29 years old from south America,

 almost 10 years working as a developer. About 2 years ago I got in love with game development, so I quitted my job and went full time on game making. 

Currently I'm working on Cultivation Path alone as a developer. 

Thankfully I'm quite well financially, so focusing 10-12 hours a day on the game is free of worries and really fun. 

Any form of feedback, suggestions or recommendations on how to handle any aspect of the game is really appreciated.

I'm confident on my skills as a developer, but a newbie on all the other areas and I'm learning a lot along the way. 

Hopefully we can shape the game to make justice to the cultivation genre!.
